about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Healthy Life Agritec Limited is engaged in the business of trading Raw Milk, Chicken and Agro Products in the state of Maharashtra and Karnataka. The company has procurement partners, to coordinate the milk procurement process with milk farmers and supply Raw milk to milk wholesalers in the state of Maharashtra.

The company sells milk powder, bakery goods, buttermilk, yogurt, butter, cheese, paneer, milk cream, dips, custard, ghee, and juices under the brand name Healthy Life.

Healthy Life Agritec also procures poultry from poultry growers in the state of Maharashtra and Karnataka and supplies poultry to chicken wholesalers in the state of Maharashtra and Karnataka. The company's products are certified with ISO 9001:2015.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Organisation stability, Rich management experience and skilled team.
  • Smooth flow of operations.
  • Well-defined organizational structure.
  • Existing Supplier Relationship.
  • Quality Policy.
  • Customer Centric Business Model.
  • ISO Certifications.
  • Comprehensive solution for logistics requirement.

faqs.question: What is the Healthy Life Agritec IPO?
faqs.answer:
Healthy Life Agritec IPO is a SME IPO of 10000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on July 13, 2022, and closes on July 18, 2022.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Healthy Life Agritec IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Healthy Life Agritec IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Healthy Life Agritec IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Healthy Life Agritec IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Healthy Life Agritec IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Healthy Life Agritec IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Healthy Life Agritec IPO opens on July 13, 2022 and closes on July 18, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Healthy Life Agritec IPO?
faqs.answer: Healthy Life Agritec IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Healthy Life Agritec IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Healthy Life Agritec IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Healthy Life Agritec IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Healthy Life Agritec IPO will be done on Thursday, July 21, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, July 25, 2022. Check the Healthy Life Agritec IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Healthy Life Agritec IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Healthy Life Agritec IPO listing date is on Tuesday, July 26, 2022.
